Hola, Un cliente de correo siempre es una aplicación (sea instalable o portable)ya que para interfaz web tienes los servidores de correo como gmail, hotmail, yahoo, etc, cada uno tiene su interfaz web de correo y en el caso de un servidor de correo privado dependerá de ellos implementar o no una interfaz web.

Agradeceríamos marcar como solucionada para que sirva a otros usuarios. ¡Gracias!

content: Tento problém môže tiež spôsobovať dosť agresívne nastavený antivírusový program. Pre kontrolu vypnite Firefox. Vypnite antivírusový program. Spustite „Správcu úloh“ a ukončite všetky antivírusové procesy bežiace ešte v procesoch. Spustite Firefox a preverte či problém pretrváva.

content:
1. Check your computer Graphics driver is up to date.

  • Exit Thunderbird.
  • Update the Graphics driver.
  • Start Thunderbird.

If you still see a problem: 2. Switch off hardware acceleration.

  • Settings > General
  • Scroll to bottom and uncheck 'Use hardware acceleration when available'
creator: Toad-Hall

content:
It would be useful to post an image showing the problem.

The 'Send' button will be replaced by the 'Send Later' button if you are in offline mode. The 'Send' button will be greyed out until you enter a TO email address. The 'Send' button should be on the 'Composition Toolbar', but do you see the 'Composition Toolbar' ? If you see the 'Composition Toolbar' and use right click to select 'Customize': Did you click on the 'Restore default set' button ?


Do you use any Addon extensions in Thunderbird? In Addons & Themes ? Select 'Extensions What addon are listed whether enabled or disabled?

Are you using the Thunderbird default 'Light' or 'Dark' theme or are you using the 'System theme' or have you downloaded a different theme?

In Thunderbird

  • Close any Write windows that are open.
  • Help > Troubleshoot mode
  • Click on 'Restart'
  • select checkbox 'Reset Toolbar and Controls'
  • Click on 'Make changes and restart'
creator: Toad-Hall

creator: armaneousuf97

content:
Thunderbird has two options to increase/decrease spacing and increase/decrease font size.

Spacing Via 'Menu Bar' toolbar

  • 'View' > 'Density' > 'Compact' or 'Default' or 'Relaxed'

Via 'Menu app' icon

  • 'Menu app icon' > 'Density' > 3 icons left to right representing 'Compact' 'Default' 'Relaxed'

Font Size Via 'Menu Bar' toolbar

  • 'View' > 'Font Size' > 'increase font size' - repeat click to incrementally increase size

Via 'Menu app' icon

  • 'Menu app icon' > 'Font Size' - click on the + icon to increase size

The above will effect the general UI of Thunderbird.

The Message Pane and compose Write area can be effected as well but it will depend upon any separate font size etc choices made in:

  • Settings > General
  • 'Language & Appearance'
  • 'Fonts & Colors' - click on 'Advanced'
  • Choose options for both Fonts for 'Latin' and 'Other Writing Systems' and any additional language eg: cyrillic

If general UI is set up to 12px and Message Pane/Compose set up to 16px then you may find a general increase in UI Font Size to 14px will not effect Message Pane as it has been set to a higher px value.
creator: Toad-Hall

content:
Non mi trovo molto bene con la nuova versione di Thunderbird (115), preferivo come era prima. lo trovo scomodo, preferivo: titolo-mittente-data

Segui le indicazioni discusse qui -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/questions/1426855

Mi piacerebbe anche poter cambiare la dimensione dei caratteri dei soli messaggi aperti ma non di tutto l'elenco.

Menu > Impostazioni > Generale Sezione Lingua e aspetto > Caratteri e colori > [Avanzate] Dim. Minima del carattere Qui inserisci un valore che ritieni opportuno. Poi togli la spunta da Consenti ai messaggi di utilizzare altri caratteri
